Crimes.Dispute_Type: Identity and credibility assessment in refugee claim
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the RPD make contradictory findings and improperly assess evidence regarding the applicant's identity?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review under subsection 72(1) of IRPA
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: RPD found inconsistencies and implausible explanations but made contradictory findings
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section requiring acceptable identity documents or reasonable explanation for absence
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Authenticity and plausibility of identity documents
Crimes.Application_Error: Contradictory findings on nationality, ignoring key evidence
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Credibility based on documentation and plausibility
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Burden on claimant to establish identity
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of fraudulent passport and lack of credible documents
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Refugee claim rejected due to failure to establish identity
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Unreasonable credibility assessment and evidentiary omissions
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Requirement to provide acceptable identity documents or plausible explanation
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remanded to a different RPD panel for reconsideration
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to establish identity with credible documents
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in documents, implausible explanations, ignored evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Failure to address relevant evidence raises fairness concerns
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of fraudulent South Korean passport
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review challenging RPD’s credibility findings
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to justify credibility assessment with specific reference to evidence
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to consider material evidence (business license)
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Misrepresentation and failure to establish identity
